name: Marinara Shepherds Pie

ingredients.name: Beef & Steak Seasoning or Buffalo  Seasoning
Herb & Garlic Dip Mix or French Onion Dip Mix

preparation: Boil potatoes in salted water until tender in Multipurpose Pot.
Meanwhile, cook meat in a frying pan until no longer pink. Drain excess fat.
Stir in seasoning, marinara sauce, gravy, and vegetables. Bring to a boil and season with pepper. Spoon into a 9” x 13” casserole dish and set aside.
Drain potatoes and mash. Stir in dip mix and buttermilk. Spoon onto meat mixture.
Bake for 45 min, or until potatoes are slightly golden.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups leafy greens with 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing.

products.name: Beef & Steak Seasoning
summary: Take simple grilled steaks and oven-roasted beef up a notch! Sprinkle this sodium-free blend liberally to complement the taste of the meat.

products.name: Buffalo Seasoning (1011492)
summary: Feel the heat with this low-sodium, spicy blend that goes way beyond wings!

products.name: Marinara Sauce Mix
summary: A simple, kid-friendly sauce that speaks volumes, Marinara is packed with the bright flavor of garlic, oregano, and basil. Pair it with your fave pasta and use it as a base layer for delicious homemade pizza.

products.name: Savoury Herb Gravy Mix
summary: This better-for-you gravy mix is sure to be a hit at Thanksgiving dinner! A vegan, low-sodium blend that’s still packed with flavor.

products.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
summary: Classic notes of chives, parsley, & garlic.

products.name: French Onion Dip Mix
summary: Ruffled chips and crunchy veggies don’t stand a chance when French Onion is on the table! Gluten and sodium free, and packed with all the delicious taste of toasted onion and parsley, this blend makes a kid-friendly dip, but it doesn’t stop there. Use it to season any savoury dish where you’d like to liven up the flavour with onion — without having to chop or roast a bunch of onions!
